com.dotmarketing.startup.runonce

Class Task00795LiveWorkingToIdentifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dotmarketing.startup.runonce.Task00795LiveWorkingToIdentifier
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StartupTask

    public class Task00795LiveWorkingToIdentifier
extends java.lang.Object
implements StartupTask
    http://jira.dotmarketing.net/browse/DOTCMS-6383 In this task we need to - Drop live,working,deleted,locked attributes from contentlet,container,template,links,htmlpage,file_assets. With associated indexs - Create new records for version_info tables associated with identifiers linking working and live inodes. - Drop old triggers that enforced rules with live, working versions not needed anymore
    Author:
    Jorge Urdaneta
